Introduction.Title: Gain detailed insights into SSL certificate usage
Introduction.Description: Monitor the growth and decline of SSL certificate adoption. Find vulnerable systems and detect compliance risks.

Feature.Title: Track SSL adoption
Feature.Description: Identify websites that lack SSL or use outdated certificates. Understand global trends in certificate adoption across industries and countries.

Feature.Title: Prevent vulnerabilities
Feature.Description: Find websites with expired or insecure SSL certificates. Use this insight for security audits or to proactively offer updates.

Feature.Title: Enrich security profiles
Feature.Description: Combine SSL data with hosting, technology stack, and company info to build comprehensive digital risk profiles.
